Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, NullPiece, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Piece class is the parent class of all Pieces
Author:
Eric Martz, Minh Huynh
